import { GraphQLString } from "gatsby/graphql"

exports.setFieldsOnGraphQLNodeType = ({ type }) => {
  if (type.name !== `File`) {
    return {}
  }

  return {
    newField: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      args: {
        myArgument: {
          type: GraphQLString,
        }
      },
      resolve: (source, fieldArgs) => {
        return `Id of this node is ${source.id}. Field was called with argument: ${fieldArgs.myArgument}`
      }
    }
  }
}

const {

} = require('gatsby/graphql')


const HeadingLevels = new GraphQLEnumType({
  // ä»–ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚‚å«ã‚ã¦ä¸€æ„ãªåå‰ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã‚‹

  name: `LinkHeadingLevels`,

const ParentHeadingType = new GraphQLObjectType({

      resolve: ({id}) => id,
    },
    depth: {

const HeadingType = new GraphQLObjectType({
  name: `MarkdownLinkHeading`,
  fields: {
    value: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.value
      },
    },
    id: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.id

    depth: {

import rehype from 'rehype'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import hastToString from 'hast-util-to-string'

const MIN_HEADER_DEPTH = 1
const HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST = 'element'
const HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST = ['h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6']

function _extractHeadingDetails(htmlStr) {
  // HASTå½¢å¼ã®æŠ½è±¡æ§‹æ–‡æœ¨ã«å¤‰æ›
  const htmlAst = rehype.parse(htmlStr)

  // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°(h1ã€œh6ã‚¿ã‚°)ã‚’æ¢ã™
  const result = []
  visit(htmlAst, HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST, node => {
    if (!HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST.includes(node.tagName)) {
      return
    }

    // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°ã‹ã‚‰æ·±ã•ã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    const heading = {
      depth: Number(node.tagName[1]),
      value: hastToString(node).replace('\n', '')
    }
    // aã‚¿ã‚°ã®ã†ã¡hrefå±æ€§ãŒ#å§‹ã¾ã‚Šã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’æ¢ã—idã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    node.children.filter(c => _isHeaderIdLink(c)).forEach(c => {
      heading.id = decodeURI(c.properties.href.split('#')[1])
    });

    result.push(heading)
  })

  return result
}

function _isHeaderIdLink(node) {
  return node.tagName === 'a'
          && node.properties.href
          && node.properties.href.startsWith('#')
}

exports.onCreateNode = ({ node, actions, getNode }) => {
  const { createNodeField } = actions

  if (node.internal.type !== `MarkdownRemark` && node.internal.type !== `QiitaPost`) {
    return
  }

  // ã“ã“ã§å·®ç•°ã‚’å¸å
  const [
    slug,
    title,
    date,
    excerpt,
    tags,
  ] =
    node.internal.type === `MarkdownRemark`
      ? [
        createFilePath({ node, getNode }),
        node.frontmatter.title,
        node.frontmatter.date,
        _excerptMarkdown(node.rawMarkdownBody, 120),
        node.frontmatter.tags
      ]
      :[
        `/${node.id}/`,
        node.title,
        node.created_at,
        _excerptHtml(node.rendered_body, 120),
        [...(node.tags.map(tag => tag.name) || []), 'Qiita'] // Qiitaã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
      ]

  // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®fieldsã«ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
  createNodeField({ name: `slug`,     node,   value: slug     })
  createNodeField({ name: `title`,    node,   value: title    })
  createNodeField({ name: `date`,     node,   value: date     })
  createNodeField({ name: `excerpt`,  node,   value: excerpt  })
  createNodeField({ name: `tags`,     node,   value: tags     })
}

const striptags = require('striptags');
const axios = require('axios');
const cheerio = require('cheerio');
const crypto = require("crypto");
const Parser = require('rss-parser');
const parser = new Parser({
  headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
});

const INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG = 'blog';
const INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST = 'blogPost';


// RSSã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå¤–éƒ¨ãƒªã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’
// Gatsbyã§GraphQLã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¨ã—ã¦æ‰±ã†ãŸã‚ã«ã¯
// sorceNodeã§å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
exports.sourceNodes = async ({ actions, createNodeId, store, cache }) => {
  const feeds = [];
  
  // è¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ãªã«ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã®æ–¹æ³•ã§RSSã®URLã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€
  const blogUrls = ['rss-url-1', 'rss-url-2', ];

  for(const blogUrl of blogUrls) {
  
    // rss-parserã§RSSæƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
    const feed = await parser.parseURL(blogUrl).then(feed => {

      return {
        ...feed,
        items: feed.items.map(item => ({
          title: item.title,
          excerpt: excerpt(item.content, 120),
          content: item.content,
          pubDate: new Date(item.pubDate).toISOString(),
          link : item.link,
        }))
      }
    });

    feeds.push(feed);
  }


  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã”ã¨ã«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç”Ÿæˆ
  feeds
    .map(feed => ({
      title: feed.title,
      description: feed.description,
      link: feed.link,
      lastBuildDate: feed.lastBuildDate,
    }))
    .forEach(b => {
      const contentDigest = crypto.createHash(`md5`)
        .update(JSON.stringify(b))
        .digest('hex');
      
      actions.createNode({
        ...b,
        id: createNodeId(`${INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG}${b.link}`),
        children: [],
        parent: `__SOURCE__`,
        internal: {
          type: INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG,
          contentDigest,
        },
      });
    });

  // RSSã«åŠ ãˆã¦ã€OGPã‚’å–å¾—
  const rssPosts = feeds.map(feed => feed.items).reduce((a,b) => [...a, ...b]);
  const rssPostsWithImageUrl = [];
  // Promise.allã§ã‚„ã‚‹ã¨503ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§foræ–‡ã‚’ä½¿ã†
  for (const p of rssPosts) {
    const pWithImageUrl = await axios.get(p.link, {
      headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
    }).then(res => {

      // å–å¾—ã—ãŸHTMLã‹ã‚‰OGPã‚’å–å¾—
      const $ = cheerio.load(res.data)
      let imageUrl;
      $('head meta').each((i, el) => {
        const property = $(el).attr('property')
        const content = $(el).attr('content')
        if (property === 'og:image') {
          imageUrl = content
        }
      });

      // è¨˜äº‹æƒ…å ±ã«OGPã®URLã‚’è¿½åŠ 
      return {
        ...p,
        imageUrl,
      };
    });

    rssPostsWithImageUrl.push(pWithImageUrl);
  }


  // OGPç”»åƒã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
  // é‡è¤‡ã‚’è€ƒæ…®ã—ã¦ãƒ¦ãƒ‹ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã«ã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
  const imageUrls = _uniq(rssPostsWithImageUrl.filter(p => p.imageUrl).map(p => p.imageUrl));

  await Promise.all(imageUrls.map(async imageUrl => {
    const fileNode = await createRemoteFileNode({
      url: imageUrl,
      cache,
      store,
      createNode: actions.createNode,
      createNodeId: createNodeId,
    });

    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'ThumbnailImage',
      value: 'true',
    });
    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'link',
      value: imageUrl,
    });

    return fileNode;
  }));


  // ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°è¨˜äº‹ã”ã¨ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç”Ÿæˆ
  rssPostsWithImageUrl.forEach(p => {
    const contentDigest = crypto.createHash(`md5`)
      .update(JSON.stringify(p))
      .digest('hex');
    
    const excerpt = 
    actions.createNode({
      ...p,
      id: createNodeId(`${INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST}${p.link}`),
      children: [],
      parent: `__SOURCE__`,
      internal: {
        type: INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG_POST,
        contentDigest,
      },
    });
  });
};


// è¨˜äº‹è¦ç´„ã¯è¨˜äº‹æœ¬æ–‡ã‹ã‚‰æŠ½å‡º
function excerpt(html, maxLength) {
  const rowText = striptags(html, '<pre>')
    .replace(/<pre[\s\S]+?>[\s\S]+?<\/pre>/g, '')
    .replace(/\n/g, '')
    .replace(/ /g, '')
    .trim();
  return rowText.length >= maxLength
    ? rowText.substring(0, maxLength) + '...'
    : rowText;
}

import React from "react"
import { Field, getIn } from 'formik';

// Formikã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
export default ({ name }) => (
  <Field
    name={name}
    render={({ form }) => {
      const error = getIn(form.errors, name);
      const touch = getIn(form.touched, name);
      cosnt isShowError = touch && error;

      return isShowError
        ? <div>{error}</div>
        : null;
    }}
  />
);

import React from 'react';
import { navigate } from "gatsby"
import { Formik, Field } from 'formik';
import ErrorMessage from './ErrorMessage';
import axios from "axios";

// ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®å€¤ã‚’åˆæœŸåŒ–
/* (ç•¥) */

// å…¥åŠ›ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
/* (ç•¥) */

// ã‚µãƒ–ãƒŸãƒƒãƒˆå‡¦ç†
const handleSubmit = (values, actions) => {

  // FormDataä½œæˆ
  const  params = new FormData();

  params.append('form-name', values['form-name']);  // for Netlify Forms
  params.append('bot-field', values['bot-field']);  // for Netlify Forms
  params.append('sampleText', values['sampleText']);
  params.append('sampleFile', values['sampleFile']);

  // Formikã®é€ä¿¡ä¸­ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ³ã«ã™ã‚‹
  actions.setSubmitting(true);
  // axiosã§éåŒæœŸã«ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’é€ä¿¡
  axios({
    method: "POST",
    headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
    data: params,
    url: "/"
  }).then(res => {
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é€ä¿¡å®Œäº†å¾Œ
    // ä»–ç”»é¢ã«é·ç§»ï¼ˆåŒæœŸé·ç§»ã§ã¯ãªãSPAã¨ã—ã¦ã®é·ç§»ï¼‰
    navigate('/application-complete');
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ å†…å®¹åˆæœŸåŒ–
    actions.resetForm();

    // æœ€å¾Œã«Formikã®é€ä¿¡ä¸­ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ•ã«ã™ã‚‹
    actions.setSubmitting(false);
  }).catch(err => {
    // ãªã«ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
    actions.setSubmitting(false);

    /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */
  });
}

    data-netlify="true"  {/* Netlifyã§Formã‚’èªè­˜ã•ã›ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®å±æ€§ */}
    netlify-honeypot="bot-field" {/* Netlifyã§Formã‚’èªè­˜ã•ã›ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®å±æ€§ */}

// sourceNodesã«ã¦å¤–éƒ¨ç”»åƒã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
exports.sourceNodes = async ({ actions, createNodeId, cache, store }) => {
  /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */

  // ã“ã“ã§ã¯å¤–éƒ¨ç”»åƒã®URLã®é…åˆ—ã‚’å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚’ç¤ºã™
  await Promise.all(sampleImageUrls.map(async sampleImageUrl => {

    // createRemoteFileNodeã§å¤–éƒ¨ã®ç”»åƒã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
    const fileNode = await createRemoteFileNode({
      url: sampleImageUrl,

    });

    // ä»–ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨åŒºåˆ¥ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®è­˜åˆ¥å­ã‚’ä»˜ä¸
    await actions.createNodeField({

    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,

    });

    return fileNode;
  }));

  /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */
}

import React from 'react';

// OGPç”»åƒã®URLã‚’å¼•æ•°ã«å–ã‚‹
export default ({ url }) => (
  <StaticQuery
    query={graphql`
      query {
        allFile(
          # Gatsby Buildã§ä»˜ä¸ã—ãŸè­˜åˆ¥å­ã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«
          # å…¨ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰OPGç”»åƒã®ã¿æŠ½å‡º
          filter: {fields: {SampleImage: {eq: "true"}}}

              }

              fields {
                # ä¸€å¿œãƒ¡ã‚¿æƒ…å ±ã‚‚å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
                SampleImage

    render={data => {
      // OGPç”»åƒãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®ä¸­ã‹ã‚‰ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆå¼•æ•°ã§æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸURLã®ç”»åƒã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹
      const targetEdge = data.allFile.edges.find(edge => edge.node.fields.link === url);

      // ç”»åƒãŒå–å¾—ã§ããŸå ´åˆã®ã¿gatsby-imageã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è¿”ã™
      return (

          : null
      );
    }}
  />
);

const axios = require('axios');
const cheerio = require('cheerio');
const { createRemoteFileNode } = require(`gatsby-source-filesystem`);

// sourceNodesã«ã¦å¤–éƒ¨ç”»åƒã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹
exports.sourceNodes = async ({ actions, createNodeId, cache, store }) => {
  /* (ä¸­ç•¥) */


  // WEBã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆURLã‹ã‚‰HTMLã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã¦OGPã‚’æŠ½å‡º
  const ogpImageUrls = [];
  // Promise.allã§å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆå¤šå¯ã§503ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§foræ–‡ã§ä¸€ä»¶ãšã¤å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
  for (const postUrl of postUrls) {
    
    const res = await axios.get(postUrl.link, {
      headers: {'User-Agent': 'something different'},
    })

    // cheerioã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦HMTLã‹ã‚‰OGPç”»åƒURLã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    let ogpImageUrl;
    const $ = cheerio.load(res.data)
    $('head meta').each((i, el) => {
      const property = $(el).attr('property')
      const content = $(el).attr('content')
      if (property === 'og:image') {
        ogpImageUrls.push(ogpImageUrl);
      }
    });
  }

  // å–å¾—ã—ãŸOGPç”»åƒURLã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
  await Promise.all(ogpImageUrls.map(async imageUrl => {
    const fileNode = await createRemoteFileNode({
      url: imageUrl,
      cache,
      store,
      createNode: actions.createNode,
      createNodeId: createNodeId,
    });

    // ä»–ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨åŒºåˆ¥ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®è­˜åˆ¥å­ã‚’ä»˜ä¸
    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'OgpImage',
      value: 'true',
    });

    // ãƒ¡ã‚¿æƒ…å ±ã¨ã—ã¦ç”»åƒã®URLã‚’ä»˜ä¸
    await actions.createNodeField({
      node: fileNode,
      name: 'link',
      value: imageUrl,
    });

    return fileNode;
  }));

import remark from 'remark'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import mdastToString from 'mdast-util-to-string';
import GithubSlugger from 'github-slugger';
const githubSlugger = new GithubSlugger()

// ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‹ã‚‰ç›®æ¬¡æƒ…å ±ã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹
function _extractToc(rawMarkdownBody) {
  githubSlugger.reset();

  const result = []
  const ast = remark().parse(rawMarkdownBody);
  visit(ast, 'heading', child => {
    const value = child.children[0].value
    const id = githubSlugger.slug(value || mdastToString(child))
    const depth = child.depth
    result.push({
      value,
      id,
      depth
    })
  })

  return result
}

import React from 'react';
import { throttle } from 'lodash';
import Toc from './toc';

const githubSlugger = new GithubSlugger()


class ScrollSyncToc extends React.Component {
  constructor(props, context) {
    super(props, context);

    this.toc = _getToc(this.props.rawMarkdownBody)

    this.state = {
      activeItemIds: [],
      itemTopOffsets: [],
    };

    this.calculateItemTopOffsets = this.calculateItemTopOffsets.bind(this);
    this.handleScroll = throttle(this.handleScroll.bind(this), 100) // è² è·è»½æ¸›ã®ãŸã‚é–“å¼•ã
  }

  componentDidMount() {
    this.calculateItemTopOffsets();
    window.addEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);
  }

  componentWillUnmount() {
    window.removeEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);
  }

  calculateItemTopOffsets() {
    this.setState({
      itemTopOffsets: _getElementTopOffsetsById(this.toc),
    });
  }

  handleScroll() {
    const { itemTopOffsets } = this.state;

    const item = itemTopOffsets.find((current, i) => {
      const next = itemTopOffsets[i + 1]

      // è‡ªç« ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
      // ã‹ã¤ æ¬¡ç« ã¾ã§ã¯ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ å ´åˆã¯
      // è‡ªç« ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã¿ãªã™
      return next
        ? window.scrollY >= current.offsetTop &&
            window.scrollY < next.offsetTop
        : window.scrollY >= current.offsetTop;
    })

    // Qiitaã£ã½ãè‡ªç« ã¨ã‚ã‚ã›ã¦è¦ªç« ã‚’ãƒã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã•ã›ãŸã„ã®ã§
    // itemTopOffsetsã§ã¯è¦ªç« ã®å‚ç…§ã‚‚æŒãŸã›ã¦ãŠã
    // ã“ã“ã§activeItemIdsã«æ ¼ç´ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    const activeItemIds =
      item
        ? item.parents
          ? [item.id, ...item.parents.map(i => i.id)]
          : [item.id]
        : [];

    // setStateã‚’ä»‹ã—ã¦stateã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§
    // è¡¨ç¤ºä¸­ã®ç« ã«å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«ã®ã¿å†æç”»ãŒèµ°ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
    this.setState({activeItemIds});
  }

  render() {
    const { activeItemIds } = this.state;
    return <Toc activeItemIds={activeItemIds} toc={this.toc} {...this.props} />;
  }
}

import React from 'react'
import { HashLink as Link } from 'react-router-hash-link';

class Toc extends React.Component {
  render() {
    const { toc, activeItemIds } = this.props;
    const items = toc.map(item => {
      return (
        <li style={{
          textAlign: 'left',
          marginLeft: `${(item.depth - 2) * 24}px`,
          listStyle: 'none'
          }}>
          <Link
            key={item.id}
            to={`#${item.id}`}
            className={activeItemIds.includes(item.id) ? 'active' : ''}>{item.value}</Link>
        </li>
      )
    })

    return (
      <ul style={{padding: '12px', background: '#eee'}}>
        {items}
      </ul>
    );
  }
}

export default Toc;

import rehype from 'rehype'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import hastToString from 'hast-util-to-string'

const MIN_HEADER_DEPTH = 1
const HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST = 'element'
const HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST = ['h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6']

function _extractHeadingDetails(htmlStr) {
  // HASTå½¢å¼ã®æŠ½è±¡æ§‹æ–‡æœ¨ã«å¤‰æ›
  const htmlAst = rehype.parse(htmlStr)

  // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°(h1ã€œh6ã‚¿ã‚°)ã‚’æ¢ã™
  const result = []
  visit(htmlAst, HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST, node => {
    if (!HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST.includes(node.tagName)) {
      return
    }

    // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°ã‹ã‚‰æ·±ã•ã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    const heading = {
      depth: Number(node.tagName[1]),
      value: hastToString(node).replace('\n', '')
    }
    // aã‚¿ã‚°ã®ã†ã¡hrefå±æ€§ãŒ#å§‹ã¾ã‚Šã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’æ¢ã—idã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    node.children.filter(c => _isHeaderIdLink(c)).forEach(c => {
      heading.id = decodeURI(c.properties.href.split('#')[1])
    });

    result.push(heading)
  })

  return result
}

function _isHeaderIdLink(node) {
  return node.tagName === 'a'
          && node.properties.href
          && node.properties.href.startsWith('#')
}

exports.onCreateNode = ({ node, actions, getNode }) => {
  const { createNodeField } = actions

  if (node.internal.type !== `MarkdownRemark` && node.internal.type !== `QiitaPost`) {
    return
  }

  // ã“ã“ã§å·®ç•°ã‚’å¸å
  const [
    slug,
    title,
    date,
    excerpt,
    tags,
  ] =
    node.internal.type === `MarkdownRemark`
      ? [
        createFilePath({ node, getNode }),
        node.frontmatter.title,
        node.frontmatter.date,
        _excerptMarkdown(node.rawMarkdownBody, 120),
        node.frontmatter.tags
      ]
      :[
        `/${node.id}/`,
        node.title,
        node.created_at,
        _excerptHtml(node.rendered_body, 120),
        [...(node.tags.map(tag => tag.name) || []), 'Qiita'] // Qiitaã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
      ]

  // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®fieldsã«ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
  createNodeField({ name: `slug`,     node,   value: slug     })
  createNodeField({ name: `title`,    node,   value: title    })
  createNodeField({ name: `date`,     node,   value: date     })
  createNodeField({ name: `excerpt`,  node,   value: excerpt  })
  createNodeField({ name: `tags`,     node,   value: tags     })
}
